author: Simon Difford
description: Like the dessert, this is sweet and rich with flavours of egg and fortified wine.
name: Zabaglione Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Marsala Superiore DOC secco wine

recipeInstructions.text: Separately BEAT egg white until stiff and frothy and yolk until this is as liquid as water, then pour into shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
